title: High-Fidelity Nursing Simulation-Based Clinical Competency Enhancement Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level professional nursing knowledge, basic clinical problem-solving skills, and understanding of patient symptom assessment and basic medical protocols
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling and smartphone-optimized content for working nurses, reinforcing medical safety protocols and patient-centered care skills through high-fidelity simulations resembling actual clinical environments.

learning_goals: Learners can assess patient symptoms and perform emergency nursing procedures with ≥80% accuracy in a high-fidelity simulation environment.
Learners acquire critical thinking skills and medical protocol application abilities transferable to real clinical settings based on simulation experiences.
Learners achieve ≥70/100 in the "Resources" domain of the Simulation Learning Effectiveness Instrument (SLEI) and are evaluated on compliance with medical safety protocols.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
